io.scanbot.sdk.blob

Class BlobManager

  • io.scanbot.sdk.blob.BlobManager

  • public class BlobManager

    Manages binary files on local filesystem and provides access to binary files stored remotely

    • Method Detail

      • allBlobsAvailable

        public boolean allBlobsAvailable(@NotNull
                                 java.util.Collection<io.scanbot.sdk.entity.Blob> blobs)
        Returns:
        true if all blobs from collection are available locally. false if at least one blob is not available. If collection is empty returns true

      • isBlobAvailable

        public boolean isBlobAvailable(@NotNull
                               Blob blob)
        Returns:
        true if class Blob is available on local filesystem. false otherwise.

      • fetch

        public void fetch(@NotNull
                  Blob blob)

        Launches fetch of a given class Blob if it is not already available in local destination folder. Perform blocking operations, so it should not be called from the main thread.

        See Also:
        class Blob

      • forceFetch

        public void forceFetch(@NotNull
                       BlobType blobType)

        Launches fetch of a given enum BlobType if it is not already available in local destination folder. Perform blocking operations, so it should not be called from the main thread.

        See Also:
        enum BlobType
